2019 Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19)

Learn about the National Park Service response to the coronavirus outbreak.

Plan Like a Park Ranger in 2021

Visiting a national park this summer? Park rangers are sharing their top 10 lists of insider tips to plan ahead for a fun, safe adventure.

Juneteenth National Independence Day

Discover the origins and traditions of Juneteenth, one of the oldest known commemorations related to the abolition of slavery in the US.

Telling the Stories of All

Discover stories and places that tell the contributions of the LGBTQ community to the nation's history.

This Month's National Park Getaway

More than 60,000 years of volcanic activity have shaped the beautiful, rugged landscape of El Malpais National Monument.

The Buzz on Pollinators

From birds, bees, and bats, learn more about the essential role of pollinators in parks and efforts to protect them.

National Park News

Find the latest news and events, search for images and videos, and discover facts and figures about the national parks.

Photos, Videos, Webcams & More

Explore the national parks through multimedia. Search for photos, videos, webcams, and audio files on any topic.

The national park community welcomes you! Together we can celebrate these special places and ensure they exist forever.
